alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Molino, or 8 miles north of Gonzalez, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Molino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
